deleteAccount.title: Danger Zone
deleteAccount.warning: Deleting your account is a permanent and irreversible action. All your cases, documents, and associated data will be destroyed.
deleteAccount.prompt: This action cannot be undone. To confirm, please type 'DELETE' in the box below.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted.
deleteAccount.failureMessage: Failed to delete account. Please contact support.

admin.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

drafting.alertSave: Save to case functionality would be implemented here.
drafting.jobInitiateFailure: Failed to initiate job. Check backend connection.
